author: Upper Echelon
description:
With Shadows finally released, and a vocal subset of the gaming community doubling down on it being a total insult/embarrassment to the space... I wanted to weigh in with an opinion that a lot of the backlash is unjustified, unwarranted, and uneccesary.

The game has flaws, there are valid critiques to be made, but we are witnessing the unflinching stubbornness of ideology and profit motives when they conflict with the reality of a game that is not nearly as bad as some creators have been saying.

Entrenching yourself in a position so deep that you are unwilling or unable to move in the face of new evidence is not a healthy way to make the industry better.

title: Inevitable (Excessive) Hate - Assassins Creed Shadows
